report.title: Tempting Death
report.author: R3volut10nary
report.bodytext: When I made this mistake I fell into a hole, became non-responsive to my family's pleas to unlock my door and had the cops called to rescue me. But when they came I thought they were soldiers from the evil queen's army come to slaughter me and I fought them like an animal until they finally beat me down and cuffed me. That's when the seizure occurred. /n /n It can only be described as hell on earth as my body convulsed uncontrollably and I screamed non-sense and the paramedics and EMT's trying to help me while I lay handcuffed to a stretcher. They repeatedly shot me up with Haldol but nothing worked for an hour or so until my body finally shut down, thank god not permanently. /n /n I spent 3 days unconscious in the ICU.
